CharacterState: Green to white with black lines on veins
Mostly transparent with red patterning on the apical half
Black with white/yellow/blue lines and spots
Entirely light blue to green with arbitrary black markings
Dorsally brown, ventrally pale with dark stripes
White to light blue with distinct black stripes
White extends almost to the posterior abdomen, with a black spot in the center of each white area, and more speckled black lower down
White extends to posterior of abdomen, with a black spot in the center of each white area, at least an evident black line lower down (rarely broken; never speckled), and a semi-circular spot below

White, often restricted to the first few segments, with minimal black spots in the center of the white (often absent), sometimes a black spot at the front bottom of the white, and only a semi-quadrate black spot below
Same color as head, with a quadrate dorsal indentation and a dark line lower down
